document.full_text: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be active with the energy-rich u.s. gulf coast facing a significant threat of a hurricane landfall, a leading private weather forecaster predicted on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. may see several hurricane landfalls in 2011: wsi
lines_and_colors: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be active with the energy-rich u.s. gulf coast facing a significant threat of a hurricane landfall, a leading private weather forecaster predicted on tuesday.
